mapper.select: SELECT manager_id managerId, manager_email managerEmail, manager_phone managerPhone, manager_name managerName, manager_gender managerGender, manager_birth managerBirth, manager_position managerPosition, manager_address_main managerAddressMain, manager_address_sub managerAddressSub, manager_image managerImage, manager_accessdate managerAccessdate FROM manager ORDER BY manager_accessdate DESC
